headline: Video game sector: Tariff impacts, GTA 6 release, EA outlook
summary: TD Cowen senior media and entertainment analyst Doug Creutz joins Market Domination with Yahoo Finance Markets Reporter Josh Schafer to discuss the state of the video game sector as consumers pull back on spending and tariff impacts continue to hit industries. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

content.title: Video game sector: Tariff impacts, GTA 6 release, EA outlook
